Aspirate medication.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the medication by verifying the dosage and checking for expiration.
Aspirate medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Aspirate medication.tools: dosage measurement tools, expiration date check

Aspirate medication.sentence: The healthcare provider selects the appropriate syringe and needle for the aspiration process.
Aspirate medication.subject: The healthcare provider

Aspirate medication.sentence: The healthcare provider cleans the vial top with an alcohol swab to maintain sterility.
Aspirate medication.subject: The healthcare provider

Aspirate medication.sentence: The healthcare provider inserts the needle into the vial and pulls back the plunger to aspirate the medication.
Aspirate medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Aspirate medication.object: the needle into the vial and pulls back the plunger

Aspirate medication.sentence: The healthcare provider removes the syringe from the vial and checks for air bubbles before administering the medication.
Aspirate medication.subject: The healthcare provider
Aspirate medication.object: the syringe from the vial and checks for air bubbles
